Title: Relates to requiring electors to vote for the presidential and vice presidential candidates in a manner representing the plurality of votes in each congressional district
Summary: Requires electors to vote for the presidential and vice presidential candidates in a manner representing the plurality of votes in each congressional district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring electors to vote for the presidential and vice presidential candidates in a manner representing the plurality of votes in each congressional district
